# html-javascript
A collection of interesting html and javascript files. Feel free to use it, but please contribute to the repository if you make anything better in any way. For a demo, first try the data URI; then try testAll.html; the try testOffline.html. The first two are dependent on internet for loading the scripts directly from Github so they don't work in all browsers.
# Data URI that works on iPhones
data:text/html;charset=utf-8;base64,
